movie.title: Hours
movie.description_intro: In New Orleans just before Hurricane Katrina hits, a pregnant woman gives birth prematurely. She dies and her baby is in critical condition. The baby has to be kept in a neonatal incubator. When the hurricane strikes, all the power goes out and everyone in the hospital leaves. But the baby's father stays because the baby can't be moved so he has to take care of his baby by making sure the ventilator stays on. And because there's no power, the only power source is generator that he has to crank every few minutes. So he has to stay awake while waiting for someone to come for them.
movie.description_full: In New Orleans just before Hurricane Katrina hits, a pregnant woman gives birth prematurely. She dies and her baby is in critical condition. The baby has to be kept in a neonatal incubator. When the hurricane strikes, all the power goes out and everyone in the hospital leaves. But the baby's father stays because the baby can't be moved so he has to take care of his baby by making sure the ventilator stays on. And because there's no power, the only power source is generator that he has to crank every few minutes. So he has to stay awake while waiting for someone to come for them.

movies.title: Shinobi no mono: Shin kirigakure Saizô
movies.title_english: Shinobi no mono: Shin kirigakure Saizô
movies.title_long: Shinobi no mono: Shin kirigakure Saizô (1966)
movies.summary: The dream of Tokugawa Ieyasu has come true: together with his son Hidetada he rules all over Japan.
movies.description_full: The dream of Tokugawa Ieyasu has come true: together with his son Hidetada he rules all over Japan.
movies.synopsis: The dream of Tokugawa Ieyasu has come true: together with his son Hidetada he rules all over Japan.

movies.title: Gettysburg
movies.summary: An examination of the Battle of Gettysberg on both the personal and strategic level.
movies.description_full: An examination of the Battle of Gettysberg on both the personal and strategic level.
movies.synopsis: An examination of the Battle of Gettysberg on both the personal and strategic level.

movies.title: All In: The Fight for Democracy
movies.title_english: All In: The Fight for Democracy
movies.title_long: All In: The Fight for Democracy (2020)
movies.summary: The documentary takes a look at the history, and current activism against voter suppression; barriers to voting that most people don't even know is a threat to their basic rights as citizens of the United States.
movies.description_full: The documentary takes a look at the history, and current activism against voter suppression; barriers to voting that most people don't even know is a threat to their basic rights as citizens of the United States.
movies.synopsis: The documentary takes a look at the history, and current activism against voter suppression; barriers to voting that most people don't even know is a threat to their basic rights as citizens of the United States.

movies.title: Red State
movies.summary: The teenager Jarod invites his best friends Travis and Billy-Ray to have a foursome with a thirty-eight year-old woman. While driving to meet the woman, Travis hit a car parked on the road. When they meet the woman, she gives spiked beer to them and they pass out. When the three friends wake up, they find that they are trapped in the fundamentalist Five Points Trinity Church of the infamous Pastor Abin Cooper and that they will be killed. Meanwhile the church is under siege by ATF agents led by Agent Joseph Keenan that have been ordered to destroy the terrorist cell. Will the teenagers be saved by the agents of the law enforcement agency?
